item.title: Resume
item.description: Information Sheng-Fong Pai (Simon) Updated: October 2021 Skills Java, Spring Boot, vert.x JavaScript, React Hadoop, Spark AWS, GCP, Azure Cloud Services Framework design Agile development Experience Software Architect TenMax, September 2017 - September 2021 TenMax is a software company in digital advertising, focusing on real-time bidding ecosystem. It has a strong vertical integration in this domain, covering DSP, SSP, ad exchange, DMP, creative tools, outdoor ads, etc.
